name: XCTSourceCodeFrame
desc: An object that represents a single frame in a call stack that supports retrieval of symbol information for the address.

items.name: init(address: UInt64, symbolInfo: XCTSourceCodeSymbolInfo?)
items.desc: Initializes an instance with a frame address and symbol information.

items.name: init(address: UInt64)
items.desc: Initializes an instance with a frame address.

items.name: var address: UInt64
items.desc: An address that represents a specific frame in a call stack.

items.name: var symbolInfo: XCTSourceCodeSymbolInfo?
items.desc: Symbolication information for the referenced frame.

items.name: var symbolicationError: Error?
items.desc: An optional error that describes a failed symbolication attempt.

items.name: func symbolInfo() -> XCTSourceCodeSymbolInfo
items.desc: Attempts to get symbol information for the address.
